subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Isaac Haas scored 17 points, and Purdue shot 72 percent from the field during a 53-point first half to rout Incarnate Word, 96-61, in a Hall of Fame Tipoff game on Wednesday in West Lafayette, Ind.
snippet: Isaac Haas scored 17 points, and Purdue shot 72 percent from the field during a 53-point first half to rout Incarnate Word, 96-61, in a Hall of Fame Tipoff game on Wednesday in West Lafayette, Ind.
